content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: yellow_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 21}, {"type": "dandelion", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "ender_chest", "quantity": 46, "index": 28}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 36, "index": 33}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 51, "index": 36}]

thought: I am missing yellow_dye, which is needed to craft yellow_terracotta. I have a dandelion in my inventory, which can be used to craft yellow_dye. I will move the dandelion to the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: yellow_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dandelion", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 21}, {"type": "ender_chest", "quantity": 46, "index": 28}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 36, "index": 33}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 51, "index": 36}]
thought: I crafted the yellow_dye and it is in the output slot of the crafting table. I will move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11) to make space for crafting the next item.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: yellow_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 21}, {"type": "ender_chest", "quantity": 46, "index": 28}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 36, "index": 33}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 51, "index": 36}]

thought: To craft yellow terracotta, I need to place 8 terracotta blocks around a yellow dye block. Therefore, I will start by moving one of the terracotta blocks from slot 21 into the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: yellow_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 21}, {"type": "ender_chest", "quantity": 46, "index": 28}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 36, "index": 33}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 51, "index": 36}]
thought: Next, I will move another terracotta block to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 2 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "ender_chest", "quantity": 46, "index": 28}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 36, "index": 33}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 51, "index": 36}]

Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Ok

Ok

Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 9 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: yellow_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "yellow_terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 0}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 1, "index": 9}, {"type": "ender_chest", "quantity": 46, "index": 28}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 36, "index": 33}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 51, "index": 36}]

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 8
